      • setPodfeedTitle

        public void setPodfeedTitle(String feedTitle,
                   String siteId)
        Stores the title for the feed in the podcast folder's resources. Used by the actual feed so need to pass in the siteId also.
        Parameters:
        feedTitle - The title for the feed
        siteId - The siteId whose feed is being titled

      • enablePodfeedSecurityAdvisor

        protected void enablePodfeedSecurityAdvisor()
        Establish a security advisor to allow the "embedded" azg work to occur with no need for additional security permissions.

      • retrievePodcastFolderId

        public String retrievePodcastFolderId(String siteId)
        Returns podcast folder id using either 'podcasts' or 'Podcasts'. If it cannot find or is denied access, it will return null.
        Specified by:
        retrievePodcastFolderId in interface PodfeedService
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site to search
        Returns:
        String Contains the complete id for the podcast folder

      • allowAccess

        public boolean allowAccess(String id)
        Determines if authenticated user has 'read' access to podcast collection folder
        Specified by:
        allowAccess in interface PodfeedService
        Parameters:
        id - The id for the podcast collection folder
        Returns:
        TRUE - has read access, FALSE - does not
